this_title: The Tender Tale of Cinderella Penguin

introduction: Plot Keywords: Cinderella | Penguin | Fairy Tale | No Dialogue | Character Name In TitleCinderella has to stay home while her evil stepsisters go to the ball. You know the rest except everyone here is a penguin (even the mice that become the "horses") and the lost slipper is more like a swimming flipper.
